items.q: Why did I get logged out?
items.a: Admin sessions expire after the configured TTL. Log in again from /admin.

items.q: Can I open multiple admin tabs?
items.a: Yes, but inactivity may expire the session. Use Refresh in the admin header if needed.

items.q: How do I publish a MOTD?
items.a: Go to Admin → Message of the Day, enter the message, and click Save MOTD.

items.q: Why does MOTD not show on login?
items.a: Ensure a non-empty message is saved, then refresh the login page.

items.q: Where is MOTD shown?
items.a: It appears on the user login page and at the top of the logged-in user UI.

items.q: How do I set the default index pattern?
items.a: Use Admin → Index Management and set the default pattern at the top.

items.q: How do overrides work?
items.a: Overrides apply by exact pattern match and can set time field and search fields.

items.q: Why can’t a user see an index?
items.a: Check Team/User index access rules and feature toggles for that team.

items.q: How do I change the time zone?
items.a: Update Time Zone in App Configuration and click Save Config.

items.q: How do I limit export size?
items.a: Set Max Export Size in App Configuration to enforce a cap.

items.q: How do I change default dark mode?
items.a: Toggle Dark mode default in App Configuration and save.

items.q: How do Field Explorer fields work?
items.a: List fields (one per line). These become quick field filters in the UI.

items.q: How do I update the logo?
items.a: Use Branding → Upload Logo and then Save Branding.

items.q: Why is the logo too large/small?
items.a: Adjust Logo Size (User/Admin) and save.

items.q: How do I add a user?
items.a: Go to Admin → Users, fill in the form, then click Create User.

items.q: What roles exist?
items.a: Admins manage config and users; viewers have limited actions based on toggles.

items.q: How do I reset access?
items.a: Update the user and save; logout/login may be required for changes to apply.

items.q: How do I create a team?
items.a: Go to Admin → Teams and create a new team.

items.q: How do I restrict index access?
items.a: Use User/Team Index Access in App Configuration to limit patterns.

items.q: How do team bookmarks work?
items.a: Team bookmarks are shared across team members when enabled.

items.q: How do toggles work?
items.a: Toggles are per team. Disable exports/bookmarks/rules/query builder as needed.

items.q: Why does a user not see a feature?
items.a: Check their team’s toggles in Admin → Feature Toggles.

items.q: How do alert rules trigger?
items.a: Rules evaluate query matches per window and send email when threshold is exceeded.

items.q: Why is alert email not sent?
items.a: Verify SMTP settings and alert recipients in App Configuration.

items.q: How do I update the OpenSearch host?
items.a: Go to Admin → OpenSearch Connection and Save.

items.q: What does the OS status mean?
items.a: Green is healthy, yellow is warning, red is unhealthy.

items.q: Why is connection failing?
items.a: Check host/port/scheme and credentials; test connection after saving.

items.q: Why is Upload hidden?
items.a: Check Import settings in App Configuration and ensure Import UI is enabled.

items.q: Where do import indices go?
items.a: Imports go to the target index you specify; auto-created import indices can be retained for 7 days.

items.q: Why does upload fail?
items.a: Check file size limits, parser type, and required fields.

items.q: What does Backup include?
items.a: Config, users, teams, feature toggles, rules, and bookmarks.

items.q: How do I restore?
items.a: Use Backup & Restore in Admin and upload a valid JSON backup.

items.q: How do custom URLs show up?
items.a: They appear below the user header as quick links after saving.

items.q: Why is a link missing?
items.a: Ensure the name and URL are set and saved in Admin.

items.q: When should I restart services?
items.a: After config changes to OpenSearch/proxy behavior or when instructed by ops.

items.q: What does Restart do?
items.a: It restarts proxy (or proxy+frontend) without changing config.
